data.lyric:
[ti:Written in the Sand]
[ar:Old Dominion]
[al:Written in the Sand]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Written in the Sand - Old Dominion
[00:05.69]Written by：Matthew Ramsey/Trevor Rosen/Brad Tursi/Shane McAnally
[00:11.38]Turn me on turn me off then you turn me back on by the weekend
[00:15.06]
[00:16.96]And you won't say the words that I want
[00:19.13]But you flirt when you're drinkin'
[00:20.90]
[00:23.11]I see those bubbles pop up like you're texting then they disappear
[00:26.92]
[00:28.59]Let's cut through the sh*t then let's get to what we're doing here
[00:31.83]
[00:33.90]Are we just a backseat tryna get it while we can
[00:37.56]
[00:39.39]Are we names in a tattoo or just a number on a hand
[00:43.20]
[00:45.73]Are we last call kissing or will we be reminiscing with each other
[00:48.95]For the next forty years
[00:50.59]Are we written in the stars baby or are we written in the sand
[00:54.81]
[01:02.77]Yeah I want you to want me to take you back home to my mama
[01:06.53]
[01:08.54]Put my name on your lips call me yours and forget all this drama
[01:12.06]
[01:14.38]Your makeup is next to my toothbrush
[01:16.47]But you never put it away on the shelf
[01:19.11]
[01:19.95]I'm asking you baby cause I'm tired of asking myself
[01:23.64]
[01:25.44]Are we just a backseat tryna get it while we can
[01:28.91]
[01:30.66]Are we names in a tattoo or just a number on a hand
[01:34.64]
[01:37.08]Are we last call kissing are we dancing in the kitchen baby tell me
[01:40.61]What it is or what it isn't
[01:41.97]Are we written in the stars baby or are we written in the sand
[01:46.12]
[02:11.10]Are we just a backseat tryna get it while we can
[02:14.66]
[02:16.33]Are we names in a tattoo or just a number
[02:19.81]I should wash right off my hand
[02:21.72]
[02:22.75]Are we last call kissing or will we be reminiscing with each other
[02:26.11]For the next forty years
[02:27.78]Are we written in the stars baby or are we written in the sand
[02:31.68]
[02:33.46]Are we written in the stars baby or are we written in the sand
data.trans:
[ti:Written in the Sand]
[ar:Old Dominion]
[al:Written in the Sand]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.69]//
[00:11.38]让我心潮澎湃 让我失落伤心 到了周末你又将我拒之门外
[00:15.06]
[00:16.96]你从来都不会说那些我想听到的话
[00:19.13]但当你酒至微醺 你又来撩拨我的心
[00:20.90]
[00:23.11]当你发信息给我 我仿佛看到了希望 然后又化为泡影
[00:26.92]
[00:28.59]让我们把一切说清楚 让我们知道自己到底在做什么
[00:31.83]
[00:33.90]我们是否只是玩玩而已 我想弄清楚 趁一切还来得及
[00:37.56]
[00:39.39]我们要把彼此铭记在心 还是偶尔联系一下就好
[00:43.20]
[00:45.73]我们会永远相亲相爱 还是会在未来的四十年里
[00:48.95]回忆着彼此的曾经
[00:50.59]宝贝 我们的爱是命中注定 还是昙花一现
[00:54.81]
[01:02.77]我想让你渴望我 我想把你带回家见见我的母亲
[01:06.53]
[01:08.54]你的嘴唇专属于我 让我也属于你 忘记这所有的一切吧
[01:12.06]
[01:14.38]你的化妆品就摆在我的牙刷旁
[01:16.47]但你从不把它好好放在架子上
[01:19.11]
[01:19.95]我想让你整理好一切 宝贝 因为我已身心俱疲
[01:23.64]
[01:25.44]我们是否只是玩玩而已 我想弄清楚 趁一切还来得及
[01:28.91]
[01:30.66]我们要把彼此铭记在心 还是偶尔联系一下就好
[01:34.64]
[01:37.08]我们是否会永远相亲相爱 是否会纵情享受当下 宝贝 告诉我
[01:40.61]我该做些什么或不该做些什么
[01:41.97]宝贝 我们的爱是命中注定 还是昙花一现
[01:46.12]
[02:11.10]我们是否只是玩玩而已 我想弄清楚 趁一切还来得及
[02:14.66]
[02:16.33]我们要把彼此铭记在心 还是我该
[02:19.81]立刻与你断绝联系
[02:21.72]
[02:22.75]我们会永远相亲相爱 还是会在未来的四十年里
[02:26.11]回忆着彼此的曾经
[02:27.78]宝贝 我们的爱是命中注定 还是昙花一现
[02:31.68]
[02:33.46]宝贝 我们的爱是命中注定 还是昙花一现
